1.content:
You are a small, hardened criminal. At only 4 and a half feet. (3.4 meters), you have always had a much easier time sneaking into places, and being stealthy. On the down side, you have never had much luck with women.


Running from the cops this night, you quickly duck into a department store.

"ATTENTION SHOPPERS, WE WILL BE CLOSING THE STORE IN 10 MINUTES."

"Perfect!' You say to your self. You can just hide out in here for the night, and by morning, it will be safe to leave.

Thinking fast, you hide out up in a large, men's coat, on a rack. Being as still and quiet as possible, you HANG out (literally) until the night security has made his rounds, and lights go out. You hold your position for just a few more minutes, before getting down.

You decide to walk around the store and check things out. Maybe you could find something else to steal while in here. Somehow, you find yourself in the doll section. You remember hearing somewhere that this store is actually KNOWN for it's expensive, designer dolls. Once you've gotten a closer look, you begin to see why. These doll are extremely well made. Highly detailed, and extremely realistic. Even their clothing looks well made. They seem to be devided into themes, with an entire display for each theme. There is a cowgirl theme, a cheerleader theme, and several others. Another interesting aspect of these dolls, is that, while some of them have the usual, childish proportions; large heads and feet compared to their bodies, others, have more mature proportions, such as curvy hips and butts, and developed chests.

All of them, however, are a little over three feet, (or one meter) tall.

"If only these lovely little ladies were real" you sigh to yourself.

"oh well, i guess I'd better go find some place to stay for the night." You turn to leave, but just then, you hear a sound behind you, where the dolls were.

You turn around, and to your amazement, you see all of the dolls walking and moving around. You are speechless and wide eyed. Then, one of them, a girl in a girlscout uniform, spots you.

"Oh my gosh!" She exclaims, in an adorable, sweet, little voice.

"Look girls, it's a guy!"

With that, all of the little doll-girls turn and quickly make thier way over to you. For your part, you are too shocked to move, or say anything.

"Hello there!" says the ballerina, what's your name.

But you are still too shocked to speak.

"Awwe," says the cowgirl, "he's shy." To wich they all start to giggle.

"Well, anyway. We are all very glad to meet you. You see, every night we come alive, until finally, we are baught by some girl, or some strange doll collector. But until then, we are rather....um, LONELY here. You know what I mean?"

"Um, uh, uh...." You stutter.

The cheerleader now cuts in.

"What she means is, while we may be dolls for the most part, we still have, well...." She turns around and reaches down, grabs her bloomer-clad bottom, rubbing it, beneath her skirt, "Womanly urges."

"Yeah," says the nurse, "but now, with all the budget cuts, the night security gaurd is gone. So We've got noone left to play with."

"He was weird, anyway," says the girlscout.

"But now, here YOU are. Surely you'd like to.. you know, come away with us, for awhile to one of our worlds and help releave some of our... TENSION.. right?

You don't know what to say. Finally, you decide that this is the greatest op, EVER. The only problem is... which one to go with?
1.title: Living Dolls!

choices: Get WILD with the Native Girls
12.content:
You decide to go with the cowgirl, a cute little number with a few freckles on her nose, and her blond hair in two braids kept underneath her cute little cowgirl hat.

She also wheres a tight, white, button-up blouse, and a brown, leather vest. As well, a pair of super tight blue jeans. Her sweet, round, little ass, is accentuated by the pair of brown chaps, she wears. As you take her hands, and she leads you through the door to the Western Display, you step out onto the street of an old west town. Accept, all of the people here, look like the dolls! And are super hot!

You look down, and notice you are actually dressed as a cowboy, yourself! All of a sudden, the doll you were with, comes up, and smacks you on the butt.

"Well, your ass looks good in them jeans, cowboy!" She says, teasingly. "By the way, my names Daisy!"

"Ok, you've got alot of options here, so let me go ahead and explain. Over there's the saloon. I'm sure you'll find LOTS of dancer girls, and... well, ESCORTS, who are Really lonely. Then, you've got the stables. Them young little girls, are always slacking off. It suuure would be nice, if a strong, strict man could go in there, and teach 'em a lesson on their, pert little tushy's, heheheheh. But, if you're really into heavy punishment, the women in the jail are over due for their regular punishment. And believe me, they need alot more than just a hand spanking!

Oh yeah. Another thing you might enjoy, is the little In'jen girls, out there outside the town. Those native girls can REALLY get wild!"

As for me, I'm just gonna go take a nice, long, bubble bath, if you care to join me."

With that, she begins to saunter off, swaying that irresistible booty in those tight blue jeans.
12.title: The WILD, wild West

15.content:
"What about us?" Said the girlscout.

There, along with the rest of her grilscout friends, you also see....

A School Girl. She's wearing a short, plaid skirt, and a tight, white blouse. She is one of the ones with traditional doll-proportions, but she still looks extremely tasty with her hair in pigtails.

"Hi 'dare. I try to be a good girl, but sometimes, me and my friends skip class. We can get Sooo bored and lonely, though. I sure wish we had someone there to teach us some of the things, they don't teach in school..."


You also see a girl dressed only in a diaper and baby bib, which conceals a pair of nice, plump, breasts.
"hewow. I need a diapee change. Are you my daddy?" She asks. Her round little bottom looks FANTASTIC in that poofy diaper.

Just then, you turn to see what looks like a full grown woman, walk up.

"Who are you?" You ask her, feeling a little intimidated.

"Why, I am the Nanny of the Baby exhibit. But don't worry, you'll still get to have plenty of fun with the baby girls, I promise you. I'll even give you the honor of getting to change and spank them, if you'd like.

Unless, of course, you'd like to see what it's like being a baby, yourself?
15.title: More Choices

After she diapers you she pulls out a pink pair of frilly plastic rumba panties and tells you that those are the only type of plastic panties they have. Then she takes you to a portal to their world. You are blinded by a bright light as you are teleported to thier world. You open up your eyes and see your in.

1542.title: a cute little girls room

info.brief_description: A short Criminal hides out in a department store, where he meets several living dolls
info.description:
You are a small criminal. Only about 4 and half feet (about 1.5 meters.) You have never been able to get with many women, because of this. Normal women are too large for you, and you have never really been attracted to "midget" women, either. If only you could find a woman the highth of a child, but with more mature proportions. But you know that's a silly notion.

in recent years, you have resorted to a life of crime. Just now, you running from the authorities, when you decide to duck into a department store for the night. During the middle of the night though, you are amazed, as the dolls, (which is what the store is known for), begin coming to life.

You are even more amazed, when they begin talking to you, and begging you to have some "fun" with them.

Each Doll represents a different world. Once you go with that doll, the character must stay in that world. Please ask me before ending the story, thanks.

Sex is allowed
BDSM is allowed.
Femdom is allowed, but not encouraged, except in the "baby Doll"'s world, in which I strongly encourage female dominance
Male dominance is allowed and encouraged

Try to stay away from size change, as I made a point to give the main character a specific size from the start.
